title: Goodness
verses: Galatians 5:22-23 (WEB) — "But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, patience, kindness, goodness, faith, gentleness, and self-control. Against such things there is no law."
Psalm 34:8 (WEB) — "Oh taste and see that Yahweh is good. Blessed is the man who takes refuge in him."
Psalm 23:6 (WEB) — "Surely goodness and loving kindness shall follow me all the days of my life, and I will dwell in Yahweh’s house forever."
Micah 6:8 (WEB) — "He has shown you, man, what is good. What does Yahweh require of you, but to act justly, to love mercy, and to walk humbly with your God?"
Ephesians 2:10 (WEB) — "For we are his workmanship, created in Christ Jesus for good works, which God prepared before that we would walk in them."
body: Goodness is both God’s pursuing love and the Spirit’s fruit in us. Receive His goodness with awe, and let it overflow in just, merciful, humble works He prepared for you.
prayer: Father, let Your goodness and mercy follow me, and by Your Spirit form goodness within me. Lead me into the good works You prepared today. Amen.
